associated_reports.name: Sleep Protocol Deviation PI Review
associated_reports.description: SLEEP records requiring review by the PI.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT 
dt.master_id

FROM (
 SELECT a2.*,
   rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY a.id
  ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a2.created_at DESC
 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_sleep_assignment_protocol_deviations a

 INNER JOIN model_references mr
 ON
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN sleep_protocol_deviations p
 ON 
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr.to_record_id = p.id

 INNER JOIN model_references mr2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN activity_log_sleep_assignment_protocol_deviations a2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id

 WHERE 
 a.extra_log_type = 'deviation_record' 
 AND a2.extra_log_type in ('pi_review', 'initial_review')
 AND p.select_severity = 'major'


) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
WHERE
  r >= 1 AND dt.extra_log_type = 'initial_review'
AND
  r = 1 AND dt.extra_log_type <> 'pi_review'

ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;

associated_reports.name: Sleep Adverse Event PI Review
associated_reports.description: SLEEP records requiring review by the PI.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT 
dt.master_id

FROM (
 SELECT a2.*,
   rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY a.id
  ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a2.created_at DESC
 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_sleep_assignment_adverse_events a

 INNER JOIN model_references mr
 ON
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN sleep_adverse_events p
 ON 
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr.to_record_id = p.id

 INNER JOIN model_references mr2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN activity_log_sleep_assignment_adverse_events a2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id

 WHERE 
 a.extra_log_type = 'adverse_event_record' 
 AND a2.extra_log_type in ('pi_review', 'initial_review')
 AND p.select_relatedness IN ('related', 'possibly related') AND p.select_expectedness = 'unexpected'
 AND (p.select_location = 'internal' OR p.select_severity = 'serious')


) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
WHERE
  r >= 1 AND dt.extra_log_type = 'initial_review'
AND
  r = 1 AND dt.extra_log_type <> 'pi_review'

ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;

associated_reports.name: Sleep Outstanding Activities
associated_reports.description: Search for records where one activity has been performed and another hasn't been performed after it (optional).
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT
   dt.master_id,
   sleep.sleep_id,
   --pi.first_name,
   --pi.last_name,
   dt.source,
   dt.extra_log_type activity,
   dt.communication_result,
   dt.checklist_signed,
   dt.exit_type,
   dt.created_at,
   dt.r
FROM (
  -- Generate a resultset of ranked results
  -- with most recently created items first
  -- that include only the requested previous and outstanding activities
  -- This allows us to see if an outstanding item appears more recently than
  -- a previous item

  SELECT
    di.*,
    dlo.exit_type,
    rank()
    OVER (
    PARTITION BY di.master_id
    ORDER BY di.created_at DESC
    ) AS r
  FROM
  (
    --
    -- SLEEP Tracker process
    --
    SELECT
      al.master_id,
      'tracker' "source",
      al.extra_log_type,
      CASE WHEN
        (select_result='follow up' OR select_activity = 'schedule follow up') THEN 'follow up'
      WHEN
        (select_result='completed' OR select_activity = 'completed') THEN 'completed'
      ELSE
        al.select_result
      END "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      al.created_at

    FROM activity_log_sleep_assignments al

    WHERE
      :activity_performed = 'general-follow-up' AND al.extra_log_type='general' AND (select_result='follow up' OR select_activity = 'schedule follow up')
      OR :activity_performed = 'general-completed' AND al.extra_log_type='general' AND (select_result='completed' OR select_activity = 'completed')
      OR :activity_outstanding is not null AND :activity_outstanding = 'general-follow-up' AND al.extra_log_type='general'
      OR :activity_outstanding is not null AND :activity_outstanding = 'general-completed' AND al.extra_log_type='general'
      OR al.extra_log_type IN (:activity_performed, :activity_outstanding)

    UNION

    --
    -- SLEEP Tracker process for appointments
    --
    SELECT
      al.master_id,
      'tracker' "source",
      al.extra_log_type,
      NULL "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      '1900-01-01 00:00:00'

    FROM activity_log_sleep_assignments al

    -- INNER JOIN sleep_appointments apt
    -- ON al.master_id = apt.master_id

    WHERE
      :activity_performed = 'appointment-set' AND al.extra_log_type='appointment'
      OR :activity_outstanding is not null AND :activity_outstanding = 'appointment-set' AND al.extra_log_type='appointment'

    UNION
    --
    -- Inclusion / Exclusion process
    --
    SELECT
      inex.master_id,
      'inex' "source",
      inex.extra_log_type,
      NULL "communication_result",
      inex.signed_no_yes "checklist_signed",
      inex.created_at


    FROM activity_log_sleep_assignment_inex_checklists inex

    WHERE

    (
      (
        :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
        OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
        OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
        OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
        OR :activity_performed = 'inex-baseline-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_baseline'
        OR :activity_performed = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
        OR :activity_performed = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
      )


      OR :activity_outstanding IS NOT NULL AND (
        :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-baseline-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_baseline'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
      )
    )

    UNION

    --
    -- Phone Screen process
    --
    SELECT
      ps.master_id,
      'phone screen' "source",
      'phone_screen_finalized' "extra_log_type",
      NULL "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      ps.created_at

    FROM activity_log_sleep_assignment_phone_screens ps

    WHERE
      (:activity_performed = 'phone-screen-complete' OR :activity_outstanding IS NOT NULL AND :activity_outstanding  = 'phone-screen-complete' )
      AND extra_log_type IN ('finalize')



    UNION

    --
    -- Navigation process
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'navigation' "source",
      extra_log_type,
      NULL "communication_result",
      NULL "checklist_signed",
      coalesce(event_date + start_time, created_at) "created_at"

    FROM activity_log_sleep_assignment_navigations nav

    WHERE
    (
      (
        :activity_performed = 'has-planned-event' AND extra_log_type = 'planned_event'
        OR :activity_performed = 'has-event-feedback' AND extra_log_type = 'station_event'
      )

      OR :activity_outstanding IS NOT NULL AND (
        :activity_outstanding  = 'has-planned-event' AND extra_log_type = 'planned_event'
        OR :activity_outstanding = 'has-event-feedback' AND extra_log_type = 'station_event'
      )
    )


  ) AS di

  LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    -- Add an exit type column for those participants that have exited the study
    -- NULL if they are still in the study

    --
    -- Phone Screen not interested or not eligible
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'not interested or ineligible (follow up)' "exit_type"


    FROM sleep_screenings ps
    WHERE
      still_interested_blank_yes_no = 'no' OR
      eligible_for_study_blank_yes_no = 'no'


    UNION

    --
    -- Phone screen not interested
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'not interested (phone screening)' "exit_type"

    FROM sleep_ps_initial_screenings inits
    WHERE
     select_is_good_time_to_speak = 'not interested' OR
     select_may_i_begin = 'not interested' OR
     select_still_interested = 'no'

    UNION

    --
    -- Withdrew
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'withdrew' "exit_type"

    FROM sleep_withdrawals wd
    WHERE
     select_subject_withdrew_reason = 'withdrew' OR
     select_investigator_terminated IN ('yes - due to ae', 'yes - other reason') OR
     lost_to_follow_up_no_yes = 'yes' OR
     no_longer_participating_no_yes = 'yes'

     UNION

    --
    -- Completed study
    --
    SELECT
      master_id,
      'completed exit survey' "exit_type"
    FROM sleep_surveys surv
    WHERE
      select_survey_type = 'exit survey'

  -- End left outer join
  ) dlo ON dlo.master_id = di.master_id

-- End ranked selection
) AS dt

-- Include player details
inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
-- Match SLEEP ID to master_id
inner join sleep_assignments sleep on dt.master_id = sleep.master_id

WHERE
(
  -- Either:
  -- no outstanding activity has been selected, so just perform a plain query
  -- or:
  -- we want the first record from the results based
  -- on an order of most recently created appearing first (and therefore overriding older records)
  :activity_outstanding IS NULL OR :activity_outstanding IS NOT NULL AND r = 1
)
AND
(
  -- Based on the activity performed selection pick the appropriate conditions
  :activity_performed = 'general-follow-up' AND extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='follow up'
  OR :activity_performed = 'general-completed' AND extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='completed'
  OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
  OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
  OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
  OR :activity_performed = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
  OR :activity_performed = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
  OR :activity_performed = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
  OR :activity_performed = 'phone-screen-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'phone_screen_finalized'
  OR :activity_performed = 'has-planned-event' AND extra_log_type = 'planned_event'
  OR :activity_performed = 'has-event-feedback' AND extra_log_type = 'station_event'
  OR :activity_performed = 'appointment-set' AND extra_log_type='appointment'

  OR (
    :activity_performed = 'inex-baseline-complete'
    AND (
      extra_log_type IN ('sign_baseline') AND
      checklist_signed = 'yes'
    )
  )

  OR :activity_performed NOT IN ('inex-complete', 'phone-screen-complete') AND extra_log_type = :activity_performed
)
AND (
  -- If no outstanding activity was selected then there are no conditions to apply
  :activity_outstanding IS NULL
  OR NOT (
    -- An outstanding activity was selected
    -- Based on the activity outstanding selection pick the appropriate conditions
    -- that the first record in the results must match in order to correctly override the previous activities
    -- If one was found, the NOT negation ensures a found record does not register as an activity outstanding
    r = 1
    AND (
      :activity_outstanding = 'general-follow-up' AND extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='follow up'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'general-completed' AND extra_log_type='general' AND dt.communication_result='completed'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-finalized' AND extra_log_type = 'finalize_phone_screen_checklist'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-pi' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-mednav' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_reviewer'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-phone-screen-so-staff' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_phone_screen_staff'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-tms-responses' AND extra_log_type = 'tms_responses'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'inex-tms-so' AND extra_log_type = 'sign_tms_eligibility'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'phone-screen-complete' AND extra_log_type = 'phone_screen_finalized'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'has-planned-event' AND extra_log_type = 'planned_event'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'has-event-feedback' AND extra_log_type = 'station_event'
      OR :activity_outstanding = 'appointment-set' AND extra_log_type='appointment'

      OR (
          :activity_outstanding = 'inex-baseline-complete'
          AND (
            extra_log_type IN ('sign_baseline') AND
            checklist_signed = 'yes'
          )
      )


      OR :activity_outstanding NOT IN ('inex-complete', 'phone-screen-complete') AND extra_log_type = :activity_outstanding
    )
  )

)

AND (
  :completed_or_withdrawn IS NULL
  OR (
    :completed_or_withdrawn = 'in_study' AND dt.exit_type IS NULL
    OR
    :completed_or_withdrawn = 'not_in_study' AND dt.exit_type IS NOT NULL
  )
)
ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;

  config_selector:

    selections:

associated_reports.name: Sleep Protocol Deviation Initial Review
associated_reports.description: SLEEP records requiring initial review by the Senior Clinical Research Coordinator.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT 
dt.master_id

FROM (
 SELECT a.master_id, a2.extra_log_type, a.created_at,
   rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY a.id
  ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a2.created_at DESC
 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_sleep_assignment_protocol_deviations a

 INNER JOIN model_references mr
 ON
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN sleep_protocol_deviations p
 ON 
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr.to_record_id = p.id

 LEFT JOIN model_references mr2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

 LEFT JOIN activity_log_sleep_assignment_protocol_deviations a2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id

 WHERE 
 a.extra_log_type = 'deviation_record' 
 AND a2.extra_log_type IS NULL
 AND p.select_severity = 'major'


) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
WHERE
  r >= 1 AND dt.extra_log_type IS NULL

ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;

associated_reports.name: Sleep Adverse Event Initial Review
associated_reports.description: SLEEP records requiring initial review by the Senior Clinical Research Coordinator.

SELECT 
dt.master_id

FROM (
 SELECT a2.extra_log_type, a.created_at, a.master_id,
   rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY a.id
  ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a2.created_at DESC
 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_sleep_assignment_adverse_events a

 INNER JOIN model_references mr
 ON
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN sleep_adverse_events p
 ON 
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr.to_record_id = p.id

 LEFT JOIN model_references mr2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

 LEFT JOIN activity_log_sleep_assignment_adverse_events a2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id

 WHERE 
 a.extra_log_type = 'adverse_event_record' 
 AND a2.extra_log_type IS NULL


) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
WHERE
  r >= 1 AND dt.extra_log_type IS NULL


ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;

associated_reports.name: Sleep Adverse Events
associated_reports.description:
SLEEP Adverse Events report for fast review of events requiring additional action or for summary reporting.

The activities are performed in this order: initial submission, initial review, PI review (if required), report to IRB (if PI review was required)

NOTE: the Last Activity Performed represents the last recorded activity for a specific adverse event. Therefore to find outstanding tasks, for example items requiring Report to IRB, it is necessary to search for the last activity that was performed, PI Review in this example.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT 
dt.master_id,
ipa.sleep_id,
coalesce(dt.created_at, dt.submitted_at) "last activity",
coalesce(dt.extra_log_type, 'initial submission') "Last Activity Performed",
--pi.first_name,
--pi.last_name,
select_severity, select_location, select_relatedness, select_expectedness, event_occurred_when, event_discovered_when,
dt.primary_extra_log_type,
dt.primary_activity
FROM (
 SELECT a.master_id , a.id "primary_activity", a.extra_log_type "primary_extra_log_type", a.created_at "submitted_at", a2.created_at, a2.extra_log_type, p.select_severity, p.select_location, p.select_relatedness, p.select_expectedness,
   p.event_occurred_when, p.event_discovered_when,
   rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY a.id
  ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a2.created_at DESC
 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_sleep_assignment_adverse_events a

 INNER JOIN model_references mr
 ON
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN sleep_adverse_events p
 ON 
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr.to_record_id = p.id

 LEFT JOIN model_references mr2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

 LEFT JOIN activity_log_sleep_assignment_adverse_events a2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id


 WHERE 
 a.extra_log_type = 'adverse_event_record' 


) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
INNER JOIN sleep_assignments sleep ON dt.master_id = sleep.master_id
WHERE r = 1 
AND (:event_occurred_from IS NULL OR event_occurred_when >= :event_occurred_from)
AND (:event_occurred_to IS NULL OR event_occurred_when <= :event_occurred_to)
AND (:severity IS NULL OR select_severity = :severity)
AND (:location IS NULL OR select_location = :location)
AND ((:relatedness) IS NULL OR select_relatedness IN (:relatedness))
AND ((:expectedness) IS NULL OR select_expectedness = (:expectedness))
AND ((:latest_activity) IS NULL OR coalesce(dt.extra_log_type, 'initial submission') IN (:latest_activity))

ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;
associated_reports.search_attrs:
severity: 
  general_selection: 
    item_type: dynamic_model__sleep_adverse_events_select_severity
    multiple: single
    default: serious
location: 
  general_selection: 
    item_type: dynamic_model__sleep_adverse_events_select_location
    multiple: single

relatedness: 
  general_selection: 
    item_type: dynamic_model__sleep_adverse_events_select_relatedness
    multiple: multiple
    default: 
      - related
      - possibly related

expectedness: 
  general_selection: 
    item_type: dynamic_model__sleep_adverse_events_select_expectedness
    multiple: single

event_occurred_from: 
  date: 
    all: true
    multiple: single
    default: -15 days
event_occurred_to: 
  date: 
    all: true
    multiple: single
latest_activity: 
  config_selector: 
    all: true
    multiple: multiple
    label: Latest Activity Performed
    selections: 
      initial submission: initial submission
      initial review: initial_review
      pi review: pi_review
      report to irb: report_to_irb

associated_reports.name: Sleep Subjects In Process & Exited
associated_reports.description: All subjects that have joined or exited the study: in process (phone screening scheduled), completed, withdrawn, ineligible, not interested (during phone screen or follow-up)
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT * from (
SELECT distinct dt.master_id, sleep.sleep_id, 
CASE 
WHEN extra_log_type = 'follow_up_surveys' THEN 'completed'
WHEN extra_log_type = 'withdraw' THEN 'withdrawn'
WHEN ps_interested1 = 'not interested' OR ps_interested2 = 'not interested' OR ps_still_interested = 'no'
  THEN 'not interest during phone screening'
WHEN extra_log_type = 'perform_screening_follow_up' AND eligible_for_study_blank_yes_no = 'no'
  THEN 'ineligible'
WHEN extra_log_type = 'perform_screening_follow_up' AND follow_up_still_interested = 'no'
  THEN 'not interest during screening follow-up'
WHEN extra_log_type = 'schedule_screening' THEN 'in process'
ELSE extra_log_type
END "status", 
--pi.first_name, pi.last_name ,
dt.created_at "when"
-- , ps_interested1, ps_interested2, ps_still_interested
FROM 
(
SELECT
al.master_id, al.created_at, al.extra_log_type,
sleep_screenings.eligible_for_study_blank_yes_no, sleep_screenings.still_interested_blank_yes_no "follow_up_still_interested", 
sleep_ps_initial_screenings.select_is_good_time_to_speak "ps_interested1",
sleep_ps_initial_screenings.select_may_i_begin "ps_interested2",
sleep_ps_initial_screenings.select_still_interested "ps_still_interested",
rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY al.master_id 
  ORDER BY al.created_at DESC
 ) AS r

FROM activity_log_sleep_assignments al
LEFT JOIN sleep_screenings
ON al.master_id = sleep_screenings.master_id
LEFT JOIN sleep_surveys
ON al.master_id = sleep_surveys.master_id
LEFT JOIN sleep_ps_initial_screenings
ON al.master_id = sleep_ps_initial_screenings.master_id
WHERE
(
(
  sleep_ps_initial_screenings.select_is_good_time_to_speak = 'not interested' 
  OR sleep_ps_initial_screenings.select_may_i_begin = 'not interested'
  OR sleep_ps_initial_screenings.select_still_interested = 'no'
)
OR
(
  extra_log_type = 'perform_screening_follow_up'
  AND ( 
    sleep_screenings.eligible_for_study_blank_yes_no = 'no'
    OR sleep_screenings.still_interested_blank_yes_no = 'no'
  )
)
OR
(
  extra_log_type = 'follow_up_surveys'
  AND sleep_surveys.select_survey_type = 'exit survey'
)
OR
(
  extra_log_type = 'withdraw'
)
OR
(
  extra_log_type = 'schedule_screening'
)
)
) dt
INNER JOIN player_infos pi
ON dt.master_id = pi.master_id
INNER JOIN sleep_assignments sleep
  ON dt.master_id = sleep.master_id
WHERE r = 1 
) dt2
WHERE status IN(:select_status)
ORDER BY status, "when" desc
;
associated_reports.search_attrs:
select_status: 
  config_selector:
    label: Select / de-select statuses to report  
    all: true
    multiple: multiple
    default: 
      - ineligible
      - completed
      - withdrawn
      - in process
      - not interest during phone screening
      - not interest during screening follow-up
    selections: 
      ineligible: ineligible
      completed: completed
      withdrawn: withdrawn
      in process: in process
      not interest during phone screening: not interest during phone screening
      not interest during screening follow-up: not interest during screening follow-up

associated_reports.name: Sleep Assessments
associated_reports.description: View all scheduled calls, communication follow-ups, phone screenings and planned assessment events in a chronological list, split week by week.
associated_reports.sql:
create temp table nav_events
as select
'' "-",
al.event_date,
al.start_time,
pi.master_id,
sleep.sleep_id,
pi.first_name,
pi.last_name,
al.extra_log_type,
al.select_status,
al.select_station,
al.select_event_type,
al.other_event_type,
al.completion_time,
al.arrival_time,
al.select_navigator,
al.select_pi,
al.location
from
activity_log_sleep_assignment_navigations al
inner join player_infos pi
on pi.master_id = al.master_id
inner join sleep_assignments sleep
on sleep.master_id = al.master_id

where
(:from_date IS NULL or event_date >= :from_date)
AND (:to_date IS NULL or event_date <= :to_date)
AND ((:type) IS NULL or extra_log_type in (:type))
AND ((:confirmed) IS NULL or select_status in (:confirmed))
AND ((:station) IS NULL or select_station in (:station))
AND (:sleep_id IS NULL or sleep.sleep_id = :sleep_id)
;


create temp table appointments
as select
visit_start_date,
ap.master_id,
sleep.sleep_id,
pi.first_name,
pi.last_name,
max(ap.id) appointment_id
from sleep_appointments ap
inner join activity_log_sleep_assignments al
on al.master_id = ap.master_id

inner join player_infos pi
on ap.master_id = pi.master_id

inner join sleep_assignments sleep
on sleep.master_id = al.master_id


where
  visit_start_date IS NOT NULL
  AND (:from_date IS NULL or visit_start_date >= :from_date)
  AND (:to_date IS NULL or visit_start_date <= :to_date)
  AND (:sleep_id IS NULL or sleep.sleep_id = :sleep_id)
GROUP BY
ap.master_id, visit_start_date, pi.first_name, pi.last_name, sleep.sleep_id
;

create temp table scheduled_calls
as select
  dt.follow_up_when,
  dt.follow_up_time,
  dt.master_id,
  sleep.sleep_id,
  p.first_name,
  p.last_name,
  dt.extra_log_type,
  dt.select_who
from
  (
    select a.master_id,
      a.extra_log_type,
      a.select_who,
      a.follow_up_when,
      a.follow_up_time,
      a.notes,
      rank()
    OVER (
      PARTITION BY a.master_id, a.extra_log_type
      ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
    ) AS r

    from activity_log_sleep_assignments a
    where
      follow_up_when is not null
      AND (:from_date IS NULL OR follow_up_when >= :from_date)
      AND (:to_date IS NULL OR follow_up_when <= :to_date )
  ) dt
inner join player_infos p
  on dt.master_id = p.master_id

inner join sleep_assignments sleep
  on dt.master_id = sleep.master_id

WHERE r = 1
AND (:sleep_id IS NULL or sleep.sleep_id = :sleep_id)
;

create temp table all_dates
as
select event_date from nav_events
union
select follow_up_when from scheduled_calls
union
select visit_start_date from appointments
;

SELECT
  al.event_date "date",
  al.start_time "start time",
  'assessment event' "-",
  al.extra_log_type "type",
  select_navigator "assigned to",
  select_pi "assigned to pi",
  al.master_id,
  al.sleep_id "SLEEP ID",
  --al.first_name "first name",
  --al.last_name "last name",
  al.select_status "status",
  al.select_station "station",
  al.select_event_type "event type",
  al.other_event_type "other event type",
  al.location,
  al.completion_time "planned or actual completion time",
  al.arrival_time "arrival time"

FROM nav_events al

UNION

SELECT
  date_trunc('week', dd)::date,
  NULL,
  '          ',
  '          ',
  '          ',
  NULL,
  NULL,
  NULL,
  --'          ',
  --'          ',
  '          ',
  '          ',
  '          ',
  '          ',
  NULL,
  NULL,
  NULL
FROM generate_series
      ( (select min(event_date)::timestamp from all_dates)
      , (select max(event_date)::timestamp from all_dates)
      , '7 day'::interval) dd

UNION

SELECT
  visit_start_date event_date,
  NULL,
  'appointment start',
  '',
  '' "assigned to",
  '' "assigned to pi",
  master_id,
  sleep_id,
  --first_name,
  --last_name,
  '',
  '',
  '',
  '',
  NULL,
  NULL,
  NULL
FROM appointments

UNION

SELECT
  follow_up_when,
  follow_up_time,
  'scheduled call' "-",
  extra_log_type,
  select_who "assigned to",
  '' "assigned to pi",
  master_id,
  sleep_id,
  --first_name,
  --last_name,
  '',
  '',
  '',
  '',
  NULL,
  NULL,
  NULL
FROM scheduled_calls


order by
"date",
"start time"
;

associated_reports.name: Sleep Protocol Deviations
associated_reports.description:
SLEEP Protocol Deviations report for fast review of events requiring additional action or for summary reporting.

The activities are performed in this order: initial submission, initial review, PI review (if required), report to IRB (if PI review was required)

NOTE: the Last Activity Performed represents the last recorded activity for a specific protocol deviations. Therefore to find outstanding tasks, for example items requiring Report to IRB, it is necessary to search for the last activity that was performed, PI Review in this example.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT 
dt.master_id,
ipa.sleep_id,
coalesce(dt.created_at, dt.submitted_at) "last activity",
coalesce(dt.extra_log_type, 'initial submission') "Last Activity Performed",
-- pi.first_name,
-- pi.last_name,
select_severity, deviation_occurred_when, deviation_discovered_when,
dt.primary_extra_log_type,
dt.primary_activity
FROM (
 SELECT a.master_id , a.id "primary_activity", a.extra_log_type "primary_extra_log_type", a.created_at "submitted_at", a2.created_at, a2.extra_log_type, p.select_severity, 
   p.deviation_occurred_when, p.deviation_discovered_when,
   rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY a.id
  ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a2.created_at DESC
 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_sleep_assignment_protocol_deviations a

 INNER JOIN model_references mr
 ON
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN sleep_protocol_deviations p
 ON 
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr.to_record_id = p.id

 LEFT JOIN model_references mr2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

 LEFT JOIN activity_log_sleep_assignment_protocol_deviations a2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id


 WHERE 
 a.extra_log_type = 'deviation_record' 


) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
inner join sleep_assignments sleep on dt.master_id = sleep.master_id
WHERE 
r = 1 
AND (:deviation_occurred_from IS NULL OR deviation_occurred_when >= :deviation_occurred_from)
AND (:deviation_occurred_to IS NULL OR deviation_occurred_when <= :deviation_occurred_to)
AND (:severity IS NULL OR select_severity = :severity)
AND ((:latest_activity) IS NULL OR coalesce(dt.extra_log_type, 'initial submission') IN (:latest_activity))

ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;
associated_reports.search_attrs:
severity: 
  general_selection: 
    item_type: dynamic_model__sleep_protocol_deviations_select_severity
    multiple: single
    default: serious

deviation_occurred_from: 
  date: 
    all: true
    multiple: single
    default: -15 days
deviation_occurred_to: 
  date: 
    all: true
    multiple: single

latest_activity: 
  config_selector: 
    all: true
    multiple: multiple
    label: Latest Activity Performed
    selections: 
      initial submission: initial submission
      initial review: initial_review
      pi review: pi_review
      report to irb: report_to_irb
    default:
      - pi_review

create temp table appointments

where

GROUP BY
ap.master_id, visit_start_date, pi.first_name, pi.last_name, sleep.sleep_id
;

create temp table scheduled_calls
as select
  dt.follow_up_when,
  dt.follow_up_time,
  dt.master_id,
  sleep.sleep_id,
  p.first_name,
  p.last_name,
  dt.extra_log_type,
  dt.select_who
from
  (
    select a.master_id,
      a.extra_log_type,
      a.select_who,
      a.follow_up_when,
      a.follow_up_time,
      a.notes,
      rank()
    OVER (
      PARTITION BY a.master_id, a.extra_log_type
      ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
    ) AS r

    from activity_log_sleep_assignments a
    where
      follow_up_when is not null
      AND (:from_date IS NULL OR follow_up_when >= :from_date)
      AND (:to_date IS NULL OR follow_up_when <= :to_date )
  ) dt
inner join player_infos p
  on dt.master_id = p.master_id

inner join sleep_assignments sleep
  on dt.master_id = sleep.master_id

WHERE r = 1
AND (:sleep_id IS NULL or sleep.sleep_id = :sleep_id)
;

create temp table all_dates
as
select follow_up_when from scheduled_calls
union
select visit_start_date from appointments
;


SELECT
  true "allDay",
  visit_start_date::varchar || 'T' || '00:00:00' "start",
  null "end",
  'assessment start' "title",
  array['report-cal-start-event'] "classNames",
  '/masters/' || master_id "url"
FROM appointments

UNION
SELECT
  true ,
  '2019-06-20' ,
  null ,
  'assessment start' ,
  array['report-cal-start-event'] "classNames",
  null "url"

UNION

SELECT
  false,
  follow_up_when::varchar || 'T' || follow_up_time::varchar,
  NULL,
  '(call) ' || 
  case when extra_log_type = 'schedule_screening' then 'scheduled HMS screening'
  when extra_log_type = 'schedule_screening_2' then 'scheduled BWH screening'
  else extra_log_type end
  ,
  array['report-cal-call-event'] "classNames",
    '/masters/' || master_id "url"
FROM scheduled_calls


;

associated_reports.sql:
SELECT distinct a.master_id, a.extra_log_type, a.id, a2.extra_log_type, a2.id, mr2.*

 FROM activity_log_sleep_assignment_med_navs a

 LEFT JOIN model_references mr2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::SleepAssignmentMedNav'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::SleepAssignmentMedNav'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

 LEFT JOIN activity_log_sleep_assignment_med_navs a2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::SleepAssignmentMedNav'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::SleepAssignmentMedNav'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id

 WHERE 
 a.extra_log_type in ('request_pi_follow_up', 'request_pi_ps_review')
 AND (
   a2.extra_log_type IS NULL 
   OR a2.extra_log_type NOT in ('pi_follow_up', 'pi_ps_review')
 )

associated_message_templates.name: sleep ps intro
associated_message_templates.template:
Hello, my name is [NAME] calling from the Harvard Football Players Health Study, how are you doing today?

I am calling because we are working with researchers at Brigham and Womens Hospital on a new study called Sleep Bootcamp, a proven program to improve sleep without medications. Id love to tell you a bit more about this study and, if you are interested, determine whether you are eligible to participate. Are you interested in hearing more, and do you have 10 or 15 minutes to speak with me right now?

Voicemail

Hello, my name is [NAME] calling from the Harvard Football Players Health Study. I am calling because we are working with researchers at Brigham and Womens Hospital on a new study called Sleep Bootcamp, a proven program to improve sleep without medications. I would love to speak with you on the phone to discuss whether you are interested and eligible to participate in this study.

You can reach me by email at [EMAIL] or by phone at [###-###-####]. Please leave a message if I dont answer and Ill call you back as soon as I can. Again - my name is [XXXXXX] from the Harvard Football Players Health Study and you can reach me at [###-###-####]. Thank you.

associated_message_templates.name: sleep ps intro overview
associated_message_templates.template:
Great!

Sleep problems are common in American adults and can negatively affect daily life and long-term health. We are offering Sleep Bootcamp to see if the proven program to improve sleep can be helpful for former NFL players. The program is delivered over your computer and phone and is 4-weeks long. Your overall involvement in this study about 3.5 months because we will be collecting information from you before and after the program.

If you participate, you will have private weekly phone calls with a sleep expert who will coach you through the 4-week personalized plan to help you sleep better. The study is conducted by researchers at Brigham & Womens hospital who we are collaborating with. If you are eligible and decide you want to participate, we ask you for permission to give them your contact information. If you participate in the program, you will receive up to $200 for your time.

Do you have any questions so far?

associated_config_libraries.name: enabled_if
associated_config_libraries.options:
_definitions:


  enabled_if: &enabled_if

    # if performed a phone screening no consent to continue, disable after 14 days
    not_all_not_interested:
      any:
        dynamic_model__sleep_ps_initial_screenings:
          select_is_good_time_to_speak: not interested
          select_may_i_begin: not interested
          select_still_interested: 'no'

      all_created_at:
        dynamic_model__sleep_ps_initial_screenings:
          created_at:
            condition: <
            value: -14 days

    # if recorded a withdraw activity, disable after 14 days
    not_all_withdraw:
      any:
        dynamic_model__sleep_withdrawals:
          select_subject_withdrew_reason: withdrew
          select_investigator_terminated: 
            - yes - due to ae
            - yes - other reason
          lost_to_follow_up_no_yes: 'yes'
          no_longer_participating_no_yes: 'yes'
      all_created_at:
        dynamic_model__sleep_withdrawals:
          created_at:
            condition: <
            value: -14 days

    # if performed a screening follow up and not eligible, disable after 14 days
    not_all_ineligible:
      dynamic_model__sleep_screenings:
        eligible_for_study_blank_yes_no: 'no'
        created_at:
          condition: <
          value: -14 days

    # if performed a screening follow up and not interested in participating, disable after 14 days
    not_all_ps_followup_not_interested:
      dynamic_model__sleep_screenings:
        still_interested_blank_yes_no: 'no'
        created_at:
          condition: <
          value: -14 days

    # if the exit survey has been completed, disable after 14 days
#    not_all_complete:
#      activity_log__sleep_assignments:
#        extra_log_type: follow_up_surveys
#      dynamic_model__sleep_surveys:
#        select_survey_type: exit survey     
#        created_at:
#          condition: <
#          value: -14 days


  access_defaults: &access_defaults
    showable_if: *enabled_if
    creatable_if: *enabled_if
    editable_if: *enabled_if

associated_config_libraries.options:
_definitions:

        never: true
        
  save_trigger:
    on_create_filestore_container: &create_filestore_container
      create_filestore_container: 
        name: general files
        label: General Files
        create_with_role: nfs_store group 600



  files_activity: &files_activity
    label: Supporting Files
    fields:
      - notes

    caption_before:
      notes: Describe the files in this container. Individual files can also be given a title and description in the file classifications.

    creatable_if:
      <<: *enabled_if

    editable_if:
      <<: *enabled_if

    save_trigger:
      on_create:
        <<: *create_filestore_container

    references:
      nfs_store__manage__container:
        <<: *ref_nfs_store__manage__container

associated_config_libraries.name: field_options
associated_config_libraries.options:
_defintions:

  field_options: &ps_field_options
  
    possibly_eligible_yes_no: &fo_possibly_eligible_yes_no
      value: 'no'
  
    cbt_how_long_ago: &fo_cbt_how_long_ago
      edit_as: 
        field_type: select_cbt_how_long_ago
        alt_options:
          - more than 5 years ago
          - less than 5 years ago

    sa_severity: &sa_severity
      edit_as: 
        field_type: select_severity
        alt_options:
          - mild
          - moderate
          - severe
          - unsure

    alcohol_frequency:
      edit_as:
        field_type: select_alcohol_frequency
        alt_options:
          Never: 0
          Monthly or less: 1
          2-4 times a month: 2
          2-3 times a week: 3
          4 or more times a week: 4
          
    daily_alcohol:
      edit_as:
        field_type: select_daily_alcohol
        alt_options:
          0, 1 or 2: 0
          3 or 4: 1
          5 or 6: 2
          7, 8 or 9: 3
          10 or more: 4
          
    six_or_more_frequency:
      edit_as:
        field_type: select_six_or_more_frequency
        alt_options:
          Never: 0
          Less than monthly: 1
          Monthly: 2
          Weekly: 3
          Daily or almost daily: 4

associated_config_libraries.name: eligibility
associated_config_libraries.options:
_definitions:

  ###################################
  # HMS Phone Screen
  ###################################
  
  gave_consent_to_share: &gave_consent_to_share
    any_gave_consent:
      any_gave_consent_to_share_ineligible:
        dynamic_model__sleep_ps_non_eligibles:
          consent_to_pass_info_to_bwh_yes_no: 'yes'
          consent_to_pass_info_to_bwh_2_yes_no: 'yes'
      any_gave_consent_to_share_possibly_eligible:
        dynamic_model__sleep_ps_possibly_eligibles:
          consent_to_pass_info_to_bwh_yes_no: 'yes'
          consent_to_pass_info_to_bwh_2_yes_no: 'yes'
      any_gave_consent_to_share_eligible:
        dynamic_model__sleep_ps_eligibles:
          consent_to_pass_info_to_bwh_yes_no: 'yes'
          consent_to_pass_info_to_bwh_2_yes_no: 'yes'
      any_gave_consent_to_share_eligible_follow_up:
        dynamic_model__sleep_ps_eligibility_followups:
          consent_to_pass_info_to_bwh_yes_no: 'yes'
          consent_to_pass_info_to_bwh_2_yes_no: 'yes'
          

  gave_and_understood_consent: &gave_and_understood_consent
    all_gave_and_understood_consent:
      <<: *gave_consent_to_share
      all:
        dynamic_model__sleep_ps_screener_responses:
          comm_clearly_in_english_yes_no: 'yes'
          give_informed_consent_yes_no_dont_know: 'yes'


  # HMS Phone Screen - participant eligible and gave consent
  all_eligible_and_gave_consent: &all_eligible_and_gave_consent
    all_eligible_and_gave_consent:
      <<: *gave_consent_to_share
      any_eligible_outcome:
        dynamic_model__sleep_ps_eligibility_followups:
          outcome: eligible
        dynamic_model__sleep_ps_screener_responses:
          outcome: eligible
            
  all_eligible_and_gave_consent_hms_finalized: &all_eligible_and_gave_consent_hms_finalized            
    all_eligible_and_gave_consent_hms_finalized:
      all_finalized:
        activity_log__sleep_assignment_phone_screens:
          extra_log_type: finalize

      <<: *all_eligible_and_gave_consent



  any_ineligible: &any_ineligible
    any_ineligible:
      dynamic_model__sleep_ps_screener_responses:
        outcome: ineligible
      dynamic_model__sleep_ps_eligibility_followups:
        outcome: ineligible

associated_config_libraries.name: e_signature
associated_config_libraries.options: _definitions: ################################## # Electronic Signature defaults ################################## e_signature_defaults: &e_signature_defaults fields: &fields_e_sign - placeholder_get_started - e_signed_document - e_signed_status - e_signed_how - e_signed_at - placeholder_in_progress - e_signed_by - e_signed_code field_options: &field_options_e_sign e_signed_status: edit_as: field_type: select_status alt_options: # - cancel and unlock - sign now view_options: show_cancel: yes caption_before: &caption_before_e_sign placeholder_get_started: | The following steps will guide you through the process of signing the document. You will have the opportunity to review the document fully before signing. You do not have to complete the review and signature in a single session. The data in the document you are signing can not change, even if you have to logout and sign back in later. If you can not sign the document due to an error, inaccuracy or for any other reason, contact the Staff Member that created the document. Be aware that signing the document in this process has the same legal weight as a signature in ink on a paper document. If you are NOT ready to continue, click Cancel. If you are ready to continue with the signature process, click Save. e_signed_status: edit_caption: Do you want to sign the document now? show_caption: Signature Status e_signed_how: edit_caption: To sign the document, enter your password and the one-time code generated by the authenticator app on your smartphone, then click Save placeholder_in_progress: show_caption: | This document has been prepared for signature. Each user is presented an identical counterpart for signature. You may return here at any time to continue the review before you sign the document. To start, click Review and Sign to view the document and prepare to sign it. e_signed_document: edit_caption: | The following document has been prepared for review and signature. show_caption: | The following document was signed. Full details are provided below. show_if: &show_if_e_sign placeholder_get_started: all: id: '' placeholder_in_progress: e_signed_status: in progress e_signed_status: not_any: id: '' e_signed_document: not_any: id: '' e_signed_status: - cancelled - cancel and unlock - in progress e_signed_by: e_signed_status: - in progress e_signed_how: e_signed_status: - in progress - sign now e_signed_at: never: true e_signed_code: never: true editable_if: &editable_if_e_sign not_all_e_sign: this: e_signed_status: - signed - cancelled references: &references_e_sign nfs_store__manage__container: label: Signature Documents from: this add: one_to_this view_as: edit: hide show: hide new: not_embedded creatable_if: never: true save_trigger: on_create: &on_create_e_sign create_filestore_container: label: Signature Documents name: e-signature create_with_role: nfs_store group 600 e_sign: &e_sign_default_to_be_replaced document_reference: model_name: from: master filter_by: some_field: some value title: Document Name intro: | This document contains the , based on data at the time stated in the metadata at the end of this document. By signing this document with an electronic signature, the signer confirms the validity of the information presented.

associated_config_libraries.name: notification_base
associated_config_libraries.options:
_definitions:


  ####
  # Boilerplace for notifying roles
  # Add role or users attributes
  # Override the subject: and if: structures to refine operation
  ####

  # Default email - just add roles or users
  notify_email_default: &notify_email_default
    type: email
    layout_template: sleep notification layout
    content_template: sleep notification message
    role: 
    subject: "Sleep Study App: Notification message"
    extra_substitutions:
      reason: ''
      extra_text: ''
      panel_tab: none
      

  # Default SMS - just add roles or users
  notify_sms_default: &notify_sms_default
    type: sms
    layout_template: standard sms layout
    content_template: sleep sms notification
    role: 
    subject: "Sleep Study Notification"

associated_config_libraries.name: notify_roles
associated_config_libraries.options:
_definitions:


  ####
  # Boilerplace for notifying roles
  # Directly call in a trigger like:
  #
  # save_trigger:
  #   on_create:
  #     notify: &notify_hms_ps
  #
  ####
  
  # HMS Phone Screener
  notify_hms_ps: &notify_hms_ps
    <<: *notify_email_default
    role: email - hms phone screener

  # HMS Phone Screener SMS
  notify_hms_ps_sms: &notify_hms_ps_sms
    <<: *notify_sms_default
    role: sms - hms phone screener

  # BWH Phone Screener
  notify_bwh_ps: &notify_bwh_ps
    <<: *notify_email_default
    role: email - bwh phone screener

  # BWH Phone Screener SMS
  notify_bwh_ps_sms: &notify_bwh_ps_sms
    <<: *notify_sms_default
    role: sms - bwh phone screener

  # Interventionist
  notify_interventionists: &notify_interventionists
    <<: *notify_email_default
    role: email - interventionist

  # Interventionist SMS
  notify_interventionists_sms: &notify_interventionists_sms
    <<: *notify_sms_default
    role: sms - interventionist

  # Interventionist
  notify_assigned_interventionist_option: &notify_assigned_interventionist
    <<: *notify_email_default
    users:
      dynamic_model__sleep_appointments:
        interventionist: return_value
        

  # Interventionist SMS
  notify_assigned_interventionist_option_sms: &notify_assigned_interventionist_sms
    <<: *notify_sms_default
    users:
      dynamic_model__sleep_appointments:
        interventionist: return_value


  # PI
  notify_pi: &notify_pi
    <<: *notify_email_default
    role: email - pi

  # PI SMS
  notify_pi_sms: &notify_pi_sms
    <<: *notify_sms_default
    role: sms - pi
